page.title: 16Questionaire on Brereton.
page.content: As a class, we decided that the best way of finding out facts about Brereton, was to deliver a Questionaire to each household.We del- ivered approximately 130 leaflets and we had 60 returned, so we felt that the replies would reflect the thoughts of the majority of the local populace. The first question we asked was: {How many people are resident in your {house?}The total from the returned forms was 180 people. We estimated therefore that there are approximately 360 people living in the area. The second question was also to do with population asking{:How long had {the family lived in the area.}We have put the results into a chart,which we felt were quite interesting.They show that some people have lived here for all their lives,and at least half of them have lived here for over 10years.
